Server.Name: Content Creator Edition
Server.Description:
NEW UPDATE REQUIRES A FRESH START!! Version 1.12 List of changes can be found on the first link below.
If you're a fan of Resident Evil, and more specifically, the Remake of the original, then you should give this overhaul mod a go!
Recommended settings: Default settings can be found by clicking the link below.
STORY: Experience the 1998 Spencer Mansion Incident as Jill Valentine. Collect keys, solve puzzles, manage your limited resources and escape from the survival horror.
PLEASE NOTE: This was designed for single player, however, it can be played in multiplayer.
More information: https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/23270-the-spencer-mansion-incident-challenge-mode-version-111d/
I'm looking for translations. Current supported languages: English, Japanese.
